alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 9:17PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WASHTENAW AND WAYNE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 915 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Belle Isle to near Ypsilanti to near Grass Lake and moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Ann Arbor, Taylor, Romulus, Ypsilanti, Chelsea, Dexter, Canton, Dearborn, Wyandotte, and Dixboro around 920 PM EST. Belleville around 925 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 29 and 57. I-275 between mile markers 9 and 29. I-94 between mile markers 155 and 224. I-96 between mile markers 169 and 192. M-10 between mile markers 1 and 11. M-14 between mile markers 1 and 21. US-23 between mile markers 29 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
